description: Officially, Chen Guangcheng, one of the China’s most high-profile human rights defenders, is a free man. Unofficially, he has become a prisoner in his own home.
title: China’s ‘Soft Prohibition’
text: Officially, Chen Guangcheng, one of the China’s most high-profile human rights defenders, is a free man. Unofficially, he has become a prisoner in his own home.
